Version updates

Version updates#

Version

Date

Notes

0.6

February 2024

Added data.bedrock_mask_from_vector() function.

0.5

January 2024

Fixed bug in _coreg.py to improve Nuth and Kääb (2011)-style coregistration.

0.4

November 2023

Made batch processing script available as an example.

0.3

September 2023

Aligned search function with the new PGC-provided GeoParquet files

0.2

August 2023

Update load.mosaic() function to include the new ArcticDEM mosaic v4.1

0.1

May 2023

Initial release
